name: Mine Clearance
description:
The player finds themselves on a grid that is meant to look like a minefield (did not spend any time on the aesthetics). With a shovel in hand, they must valiantly dig up the dirt that surrounds the spot they believe the mine is set , in preparation for the professional bomb diffusers (bomb diffuser professionals are not included in the gameplay).

Bitbucket code: https://bitbucket.org/fateshow/fateshow-sfas22_base/
